traits.name: Burden of Time
entries: Beasts and humanoids, other than shadar-kai, have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the gloom weaver.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The gloom weaver has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gloom weaver makes two spear attacks and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

actions.name: Shadow Spear
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12 damage) necrotic damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12 damage) necrotic damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
